rules_text: Fusion Art - {3}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/3 green and black Telethia creature token with “As long as this creature is untapped, it has hexproof.” If {U} was spent, create an Ether Cylinder token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
notes: 2.2.0: Made the ability cheaper and instant speed but it comes in tapped which better encourages sorcery speed usage if you want to use that ether cylinder.
